p: RNase P is a ribonucleoprotein complex composed of a catalytically active RNA subunit (M1 RNA) and a protein subunit (C5 protein). In addition, M1 RNA can be modified to target transfer RNA (tRNA) substrates and specific messenger RNA (mRNA) sequences.
